revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=QNAP |model=TS-421 |revision=U |asin=B00C2ANPFS;GB; |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |availability=EoL (10/01/2022) |est_release_date=04/2013 |type=NAS enclosure |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=3.5 |pwr_conn=C13 |pwr_ac_hz=47/63 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6282 |cpu1_cspeed=2.0 GHz |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=N25Q128A |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K256M8DA-125 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0, SATA II, eSATA |expansion_usb_num=4 |expansion_sata_num=6 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, CN4 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1318 |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model=88E1318 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=2-Wire RTC IC;Seiko;S35390A;;1;,,, System Controller IC;Microchip;PIC16F690;;1;,,, USB 3.0 Host Controller;EtronTech;EJ168A;;1;,,, 4-port SATA II Controller;Marvell;88SX7042;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, 2Kbit I2C 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C02C;;1;,,, Quadruple Bus Buffer Gate w/ 3-State Output;TI;SN74AHCT125;;1;,,, 1MHz, 4.5A Peak Current-Limit Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PG847B;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery, eSATA, WoL, SNMP, Link aggregation, buzzer, power switch, fan, heatsink, metal case |tp_firmware=Debian |default_ip=169.254.100.100 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:08:9B }} {{TagLine|4-Bay Business Ready Rack Mount NAS Server with iSCSI}} :[https://www.qnap.com/en-us/product/ts-421u Product page] {{•}} [https://www.qnap.com/en-us/download?model=ts-421u Download center] "TS-420U", "TS-421U" and "QV08 V2.1" are silkscreened on the main board. "FKN-20106-A00267-YS-RS", "TS-419UII BP" and "QU89 V2.0" are silkscreened on the SATA board. ===Links=== *[https://www.technologyx.com/news/qnap-introduces-new-budget-friendly-turbo-ts-420u-and-ts-421u-rackmount-nas-units/ ''QNAP TS-420U and TS-421U Rackmount NAS Units'' on '''Technology X'''] *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/qnap-ts-x21-nas-series-reviewed/ ''QNAP TS-x21 NAS Series Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6282 @2.0GHz :''ARMADA 300'' (''Feroceon'' Core) ARM v5 *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Storage: 16MB Flash, 4x SATA II, 2x eSATA *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 3.0, 2x USB 2.0 (Type A) ports *Power: 120-240V AC via C13 ===See also=== :;[[QNAP]] • [[List of NAS Devices]] • [[Marvell]] *[[QNAP HS-210]] • Marvell 88F6282 @1.6GHz *[[QNAP TS-112]] • Marvell 88F6282 @1.2GHz *[[QNAP TS-219P+]] • Marvell 88F6282 @1.6GHz *[[QNAP TS-220]] • Marvell 88F6282 @1.6GHz *[[QNAP TS-221]] • Marvell 88F6282 @2.0GHz *[[QNAP TS-419P]] • Marvell 88F6281 @1.2GHz *[[QNAP TS-419P II]] • Marvell 88F6282 @2.0GHz *[[QNAP TS-419U II]] • Marvell 88F6282 @2.0GHz *[[QNAP TS-420U]] • Marvell 88F6282 @1.6GHz *[[QNAP TS-421U]] • Marvell 88F6282 @2.0GHz ==Images== ---- File:QNAP TS-421U Top.jpeg|Board Top File:QNAP TS-421U Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:QNAP TS-421U SATA Board Front.jpeg|SATA Board Front File:QNAP TS-421U SATA Board Back.jpeg|SATA Board Back File:QNAP TS-421U Internal.jpeg|Internal [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
